last_episode_to_air.name: Catch
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the aftermath of another sudden killing, Dong-sik joins hands with Ju-won to bring down the guilty — and deliver necessary punishment.

name: Beyond Evil
overview: As a killing resembling a cold case resurfaces in a small town, the chase for the truth falls on two policemen who each harbor secrets of their own.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: As a killing resembling a cold case resurfaces in a small town, the chase for the truth falls on two policemen who each harbor secrets of their own.

tagline: These days... I think it's useless to trust someone.

episodes.name: Appear
episodes.overview: When young hotshot Han Ju-won arrives in town, he's assigned to partner with Lee Dong-sik, a maverick cop with a gruesome tragedy in his past.

episodes.name: Disappear
episodes.overview: The discovery of an unidentified human skeleton raises unsettling possibilities. Dong-sik drags Kang Min-jeong back to town from a Seoul night club.

episodes.name: Smiled
episodes.overview: Ju-won's suspicions about Dong-sik's involvement in the case intensify. The emergence of a mysterious cellphone places Ju-won in a tight spot.

episodes.name: Cried
episodes.overview: Coming up empty with Dong-sik's interrogation, the police root around Yoo Jae-i's butcher shop. Ju-won makes an explosive statement to the public.

episodes.name: The Deceit
episodes.overview: A fight breaks out as Dong-sik prevents Kang Jin-muk from being taken advantage of. Oh Ji-hun is confronted about the night of the disappearance.

episodes.name: To Deceive
episodes.overview: Ju-won agrees to Jin-muk's request to carry out his own unofficial investigation. Do Hae-won moves to put an end to the case and protect her son.

episodes.name: The Text Messages
episodes.overview: Park Jeong-je does the right thing. The arrival of a second text from Min-jeong points Dong-sik toward someone who's figured out the truth.

episodes.name: The Arrest and Interrogation
episodes.overview: News of the killer's arrest scandalizes the town. The killer refuses to speak to anyone but Dong-sik and Ju-won. Their interrogation hits a nerve.

episodes.name: Bodies Found
episodes.overview: Following a clue from an old video, Dong-sik searches desperately for his sister's remains. Ju-won and Jae-i each return after three months away.

episodes.name: Interrogating the Chief
episodes.overview: Seeing CCTV footage, Dong-sik is convinced he's figured out the real culprit behind the killer's death. Ju-won puts a GPS tracker on Nam Sang-bae.

episodes.name: Who Killed Sang-bae?
episodes.overview: Committed to getting to the bottom of the latest murder, the team pulls together — and considers two of their own as prime suspects.

episodes.name: Jeong-je and the Deer
episodes.overview: The truth behind the events from the night of Lee Yu-yeon's death begins to unravel. Jeong-je struggles to remember what happened.

episodes.name: The Next Commissioner General
episodes.overview: As detectives begin to connect the dots, Han Ki-hwan's ties to the case become clearer. Dong-sik asks Ju-won if he can trust him.

episodes.name: Setting the Trap
episodes.overview: Dong-sik listens in on a conversation that brings to light many long-held secrets. A determined Ju-won sets out to uncover further truths.

episodes.name: Letting Go
episodes.overview: After obtaining an astonishing audio recording, Ju-won resolves to pursue justice at any cost. Dong-sik and Ju-won question Lee Chang-jin.

episodes.name: Catch
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of another sudden killing, Dong-sik joins hands with Ju-won to bring down the guilty — and deliver necessary punishment.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: As a killing resembling a cold case resurfaces in a small town, the chase for the truth falls on two policemen who each harbor secrets of their own.
